name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026** is a celebration of global sounds and eclectic artistry, bringing together 11 talented acts from 10 different countries. With a strong focus on diversity, the lineup spans across genres such as electronic, psychedelic, jazz, indie pop, Anatolian rock, and Malian desert blues, creating a rich tapestry of musical expression. Notably, 7 out of the 11 artists identify as people of color, reflecting the festival’s commitment to showcasing diverse cultural voices.

The festival highlights a balanced mix of emerging and established talent, with acts hailing from Germany, the Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Iran, and more. This year’s lineup also spotlights a variety of unique influences, such as minimalist electropop, traditional Iranian music, and 80s-inspired sounds, offering something for every music lover. With 100% of the artists providing Spotify links, attendees have a chance to preview the dynamic range of music before the big event.

Footprints Festival 2026 is set to offer an inclusive experience, with a lineup featuring artists of different genders and international backgrounds. While male performers make up the majority, the inclusion of female and mixed-gender acts adds depth to the roster. With an impressive average artist rating of 7.73, and 73% of artists rated highly (8-10), the festival promises a stellar showcase of talent and creativity.
